author: daxian-dbw
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
Import-Module PackageM<tab>
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
Tab completion works and `PackageM<tab>` is completed to `PackageManagement`


Actual behavior
---------------

It doesn't work

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta
PSEdition                      Core
CLRVersion
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.2-33-gf4e25b7eef000f783eb145b98a9ff98d726a29f9
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.15063
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

Related to #4011
title: `Import-Module PackageM<tab>` doesn't auto complete
